member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.API.Extensions
member.summary: Internal extensions for the Jobs module.

member.name: M:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.API.Extensions.AddJobsModule(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the Jobs module to the service collection.
member.returns: It will return the same service collection.

member.name: M:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.API.Extensions.UseJobsModule(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder)
member.summary: Adds the Jobs module to the application builder.
member.returns: It will return the same application builder.

member.name: T:Hyre.Modules.Jobs.API.IJobsApiMarker
